title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: August 16, 2022, 11:54:20 PMLast edit: August 28, 2022, 07:05:40 PM by ZipReg
content: Greeting Everyone! I hope you're all doing well! THIS IS A FREE RAFFLE FOR CONTESTANTS OF THETIMES TRAVELER CRYPTO PUZZLE CONTEST ONLY!!#001 Canvas Crypto Puzzle Contest  BONUS ROUND!!I thought it would be very appropriate to offer the contestants of the #001 contesta chance at a prototype of the canvas design concept for the #002 contest!#002 Canvas Crypro Puzzle Contest Prototype #002Casascius KEEP CALM and HODL 16x20 Gallery Wrapped CanvasIcedminerjonesminerjonesgarciaor2002ragilab MrCryptHodlEst2013pinky1234DernosteGeoMoparMiningLLCHookzup1Hookzup1Welcome Contestants!! As this is the first "Bonus Round" so to speak,I will note here that contestants will be responsible for the shipping costsof any bonus items that you may win during the contest. Thank you!Contestants listed twice have multiple entries and can choose two slots.Tickets:1 -2 - pinky12343 - Est20134 - Hookzup15 - Dernoste6 - MrCryptHodl7 -8 - ragilab9 - garciaor20020 - minerjonesa - geob - Icedc - Mopard - Hookzup1e -f - minerjonesGeneral Info: Price Per Ticket: 1 FREE SPOT PER LIMITED EDITION CANVAS/CONTESTANTShipping: Paid by winner. Any Import/VAT taxes paid by winner.How To Play:Pick one or more of the available Tickets slots from the table above. Once all Contestants have picked a slot, we'll select a future BTC block number. The last character in the hash of that block will decide the winner! Thank You & Good Luck!
